volcanno_testimonial_carousel-2.title: What our clients say
volcanno_testimonial_carousel-2.content: [text="Really happy with the guidance you provided. Our employees are now more aware of their role in information security and management of IT is much efficient now." author="Vladimir Mrkela, PIXEL INDUSTRY Ltd."] [text="Just wanted to thank ConsultingPress for providing exceptional IT security consulting service to our company. Our IT security costs dropped significantly so we could focus more on our core business." author="Scott Rogers, Poleo Digital"] [text="I always love when you uploadsomething new. Your attention to detail, uniqueness and story driven design is a joy to explore. Every pixel is there for a reason, nothing is generic, and it all works great together. Truly an inspiration to look p to, and steal from :)" author="ColorByt, Web Designer"]
